combine.1: Get out of here, /player/. This area isn't safe.
combine.2: Identify yourself and state your purpose, /player/.
combine.3: Seen any suspicious people around lately, /player/?

resistance.2: Watch your back, /player/. Combine patrol just passed by.
resistance.3: /player/, we need to figure out how to get more supplies.
resistance.4: How's it going on your end, /player/?

union.3: Our enemies are about to face tough times, /player/.
union.4: My wages got delayed again, /player/. Got any ideas?

warlord.4: Stay sharp, /player/. Someone's eyeing our turf.

church.2: Have you... heard the voices from below recently?
church.3: There's a light at the end of the alley. Come find us, /player/.

bandit.2: Be careful, /player/. The cops are cracking down hard.
bandit.3: We need to find a new hideout, /player/.
bandit.4: I'm a bit short on cash, /player/. Know any good money-making schemes?
bandit.5: Don't trust anyone, /player/. Not even me.

other.2: This area isn't safe, /player/. Watch yourself.
other.4: Didn't expect to see you in /map/, /player/.
other.5: If I were you, I wouldn't come to this place, /player/.

combine.1: Stay alert, the Resistance could be anywhere.
combine.2: Any breach of discipline will be severely punished.
combine.4: This place is so boring, I can't wait to get back to base.
combine.5: Anyone got some military gum? I'm feeling sleepy.
combine.6: This patrol route is so long, when will it end...
combine.7: That damn floor last night left my back aching.
combine.8: Found Lambda graffiti, looks like the Resistance's supply point is here.
combine.9: Civilians are undergoing thought correction, maintain 50-meter security radius.
combine.10: Radio signals are being jammed, probably Resistance's electronic warfare equipment.
combine.11: Outpost 17's auto-turrets need recalibration of firing parameters.
combine.12: Suppression protocol updated to version 1.14, all units sync tactical data.
combine.13: If I find out who used my gas mask as an ashtray, they're dead meat.
combine.14: Suspicious activity in the subway tunnels, take two houndeyes to check it out.

resistance.1: Running low on ammo... hope supplies arrive soon.
resistance.2: This damn gun's acting up again, anyone got tools to fix it?
resistance.3: My gas mask's gone missing again, what the hell!
resistance.4: Don't let your guard down, the combine could strike any moment.
resistance.5: I'm so sick of these canned rations, I'd kill for some fresh veggies.
resistance.6: This damn place is so humid, my clothes are sticking to my skin.
resistance.7: Mosquitoes were buzzing in my ear all night, couldn't sleep a wink.
resistance.8: This damn radio only picks up combine propaganda, I want real news.
resistance.9: Hey, you ever play the old arcade machines at Black Mesa? Those were the days!
resistance.10: Wonder how my cat's doing back home... she loved my fish stew.
resistance.11: This damn weather's freezing, I could use a thick coat.
resistance.12: Hey guys, anyone got a deck of cards? Let's play some Texas Hold'em.
resistance.13: This coffee tastes like mud, and I was counting on it to wake me up.
resistance.14: Hey, you hear? There's a bar opening underground in City 17.
resistance.15: The Combine owes us big time, and we'll make them pay with interest!
resistance.16: We're not alone in this fight, the people of /map/ are fully supporting us!
resistance.17: This map's all wrinkled, the edges are worn out and the routes are blurry.
resistance.18: It's so quiet here you could hear a pin drop, I can even hear my own heartbeat, creepy.
resistance.19: You hear that rustling sound? Like something's crawling in the pipes...
resistance.20: My boots are leaking again, my feet are gonna rot at this rate.
resistance.21: Anyone know what time it is?
resistance.22: Hands off my weapon, it's my lifeline!
resistance.23: Patrolling in the dark around here is no joke.

union.1: The noise in this factory is killing me.
union.2: My back's acting up again, they should pay me double.
union.3: This damn machine's broken again, need to call maintenance.
union.4: Did we meet today's production quota?
union.5: These work clothes are falling apart, they won't even replace them.
union.6: I can barely keep my eyes open... thanks to last night's overtime shift.
union.7: The cafeteria food tastes like reheated leftovers from yesterday.
union.8: Heard the factory next door went on strike, maybe we should show the boss what's what.
union.9: The pay's too low, can't even support my family.
union.10: Those capitalists just keep exploiting us, we'll make them pay!
union.11: Another batch of parts went missing from the assembly line, probably stolen for the black market.
union.12: The new guy almost got his fingers caught in the conveyor belt!
union.13: The safety supervisor's shoes are so shiny you can see your reflection, while we can't even get new gloves.
union.14: Quality control keeps mixing defective products, and we'll have to redo them at month-end.
union.15: The ventilation system's been broken for three days, the lead fumes are making my eyes water.

warlord.1: This territory's perfect for a base.
warlord.2: Need to get some good booze tonight to treat the boys.
warlord.4: Things are heating up lately, everyone stay sharp.
warlord.5: You see that? Something's moving over there.
warlord.6: We need to plan our next move carefully.
warlord.7: You hear that rumbling? The railway must be nearby.
warlord.8: Make way, some big shot's coming through.
warlord.9: Only reason I came to this backwater was for the pretty girls.
warlord.10: Frisys runs /map/, and you're all dead meat!
warlord.11: Drag that traitor to the acid pool, let everyone see the price of betrayal.
warlord.12: These bulletproof vests are falling apart, did logistics cut corners again?
warlord.13: Damn, we're running out of diesel, if we don't get fuel soon, the boss will skin me alive.
warlord.14: The med station's out of painkillers? Send the boys to raid a clinic!
warlord.15: Anyone caught hoarding supplies will be nailed to the barbed wire for the crows.
warlord.16: The recon team sent to Nova Mine hasn't reported in for three days, probably got ambushed by barnacles.
warlord.17: Those church fanatics are at it again with their human experiments. We should blow their lab sky high one of these days.
warlord.18: The smuggling route from /map/ to City 17 is overrun with antlions. Send the demolition team to clear a path.
warlord.19: Those new recruits actually thought about joining the Combine. They're now part of the concrete foundation.

church.1: Donations have been pretty slim lately, we need to step up our fundraising game.
church.2: Heard this holy water can cure anything, want to give it a try?
church.3: Bring the candles, it's time for the ritual.
church.4: The church renovations are going to cost a fortune, need to raise funds.
church.5: You know, some secrets are only meant to be shared in the basement.
church.6: The hymns echo through the dome, cleansing the souls of the faithful.
church.7: Gear up, we need to purify this area.
church.9: Last night's ritual went well, but we need more offerings.
church.10: Heard the church next door made a killing, we need to step up our game.
church.11: That new believer looks loaded. Let's figure out how to squeeze more donations out of him.
church.12: We need to soundproof the confession booth better. That widow's sobbing last time gave me a headache.
church.13: The statue's right eye stopped weeping blood. We need to replace the tomato juice tube in its socket.
church.14: Turn on the ventilation system during midnight mass. Too much of that hallucinogenic incense could be deadly.
church.15: If anyone asks about the screams from the basement at night, just say it's demons being punished.
church.16: Let's buy some cheap antibiotics from the black market and mix them with holy water. We can mark it up by 30%.

bandit.1: /map/ has high ground on both ends and low ground in the middle - perfect for an ambush.
bandit.3: This piece of junk needs replacing.
bandit.4: Things are getting messy in /map/, bad for business.
bandit.5: This loot's good, should fetch a nice price.
bandit.6: We need to plan our route, who's got the map?
bandit.7: This heat's killing me, need to find some shade.
bandit.8: Heard there's a merchant caravan coming through, let's hit it!
bandit.9: Damn curfew again tonight, we need to find a way out.
bandit.10: That shopkeeper looked at us like we were thieves last night. I bet he added a couple extra zeros to the bill!
bandit.11: The jewelry store on 17th is getting new stock the day after tomorrow. Their windows are still single-pane.
bandit.12: The transport convoy passes through /map/ every Wednesday. Remember to bring grenades to say hello.
bandit.13: The black market got a shipment of modified shotguns that can pierce riot shields. Let's grab a couple to test them out.
bandit.14: The union security has a 15-minute gap during shift change. Plenty of time to strip the copper coils from their transformers.
bandit.15: Heard the church is rolling in cash these days. Let's just swipe those golden candlesticks from their altar.

other.1: Time flies. It's almost the end of the month and I still haven't figured out how to pay the rent.
other.3: My passport got stolen at the hotel!
other.4: No, actually, I think the opposite, nothing new lately.
other.5: The view here's great, I took a photo.
other.8: Heard there's a market nearby, I'm gonna check it out!
other.9: I can sleep anywhere, even with just a blanket.
other.10: Be careful, there's lots of wildlife near /map/.
other.11: I wonder what's on the other side of /map/.
other.12: I'm thinking of writing a book. How about calling it 'The Autobiography of /name/'?
other.13: You know what? I took down a hunter bare-handed in the city.
other.14: Spent last night under the bridge in /map/. Almost had my toes chewed off by rats.
other.15: Found half of a 'Militia Training Manual' in the junkyard. It's not even good enough for toilet paper - the ink smudges.
other.16: Heard there's a group east of City 17 trading homemade alcohol for bullets. That's a good deal.
other.17: Helped the union transport some goods yesterday. Found a whole stash of unregistered pulse rifles hidden in the container's false bottom.

combine.4: Put down your weapons or we'll shoot!
combine.8: You want to test the law?
combine.9: We've got a situation here in /map/.

resistance.3: I see them, get ready to fight!
resistance.4: Want some extra holes in your body, /victim/?

union.8: What are you waiting for? Take cover!
union.10: Grab your wrenches! Let's show them the might of the working class!
union.11: The assembly line can stop, but the union's dignity must stand!
union.12: Hear that? That's the alarm from the loading dock!

warlord.2: Let's show them what we're made of!
warlord.3: Grab your weapons! Let these bastards know who runs /map/!
warlord.4: Who's the fool daring to cause trouble in Lord Frisys's territory? Looking to die?
warlord.5: For Lord Frisys, kill them all!
warlord.6: Dragons must coil, tigers must crouch.
warlord.8: I hope you've written your will, /victim/.
warlord.9: The gallows are ready for you, /victim/!
warlord.10: The last guy who looked at me like that, his fingers are still in formaldehyde!
warlord.11: You think the water treatment plant's water is always red by coincidence?
warlord.12: You're not even fit to be a roadblock, /victim/!
warlord.13: Surrender? Too late now! I'll use your blood to teach others a lesson!

church.2: For the glory of the church, destroy them!
church.4: You've seen what you shouldn't have, /victim/!
church.6: /victim/, you'll need to buy double indulgences!
church.7: Repent, /victim/, this is your last chance!

bandit.3: If you want to live, leave your stuff!
bandit.4: We'll be rich after this job!
bandit.5: Don't let them get away, chase them!

other.2: Looks like someone's gonna bleed today!
other.3: Guess I need to stretch my muscles today!
other.4: You're messing with the wrong person, /victim/!
other.5: If you insist on fighting, bring it on!
other.6: I didn't want trouble, but you asked for it!
other.7: Don't think I'm an easy target, /victim/!
other.8: Looks like I need to teach you some manners today!

combine.3: This is what happens when you mess with the Combine, /victim/.
combine.12: Looks like /victim/ won't be seeing the inside of a cell.
combine.14: Should've thought twice before messing with us, /victim/.
combine.15: Is that the best you can do, /victim/?
combine.16: Your weapons are like toys, completely useless.

resistance.1: I won't go easy on you, /victim/!
resistance.3: Seems like you're all talk and no action, /victim/.
resistance.4: Someone's gonna have to clean up /victim/'s mess.
resistance.5: Another body in /map/, rest in peace, /victim/.
resistance.6: Haha, /victim/, better watch your back in your next life!

warlord.1: The last guy who acted tough like you, the grass on his grave is two meters high now.
warlord.2: Go tell those idiots in /map/ who's really in charge here!
warlord.4: Anyone else wanna end up like /victim/?
warlord.5: Another enemy down, our territory just got bigger!
warlord.6: Let's hang /victim/'s head on the street lamp!
warlord.7: This neighborhood belongs to us now!

church.2: This is the fate of all heretics!
church.5: Keep going, wipe them all out.
church.6: The church bells will toll for you.
church.7: Behold, another lost soul has returned to the Lord's embrace.

bandit.5: Looks like /victim/'s luck has run out.

other.1: Maybe you'll learn some respect in your next life, /victim/.
other.6: Hope this is the last one.
other.8: Those who don't plan to keep their promises don't consider the difficulties when making them.

greeting.4: What have you been up to lately, /name/?

negotiate.2: I have an idea that might benefit us both, /name/.
negotiate.3: If we can reach an agreement, things will be much easier.
negotiate.4: I understand your difficulties, but we need to compromise.
negotiate.5: /name/, there's something I need to discuss with you.
negotiate.6: This is important, we need to talk it over.
negotiate.7: How about this, let's both make some concessions?
negotiate.8: I need to talk to you.

trade.1: Do you have anything special here?
trade.3: Got any good stuff for sale, /name/?
trade.4: I'd like to buy some of your things, /name/.
trade.5: Heard you've got some unique items here?
trade.6: Can I take a look at your goods?
trade.8: I'm quite interested in your products.
trade.9: Could you tell me more about your goods?
trade.11: Do you think today's deal will go well?

leave.1: Let's call it a day for now.
leave.6: I'll catch up with you later.
leave.9: I'll buy you a drink next time.

greeting.2: Nice weather today, isn't it? I was just about to visit City 17.
greeting.3: Hey, /player/! Didn't expect to see you in /map/.
greeting.4: Great to see you, /player/! I was just looking for someone to chat about recent events.
greeting.5: /player/! Perfect timing, I was just talking about you with a friend.

negotiate.2: I was just about to discuss this with you, /player/.
negotiate.3: You're right, we really need to talk this over.
negotiate.4: I was just about to ask for the details.
negotiate.5: Speak up, my time is precious.

trade.1: Of course! I bet you'll be interested in this.
trade.2: You came at the right time, /player/, check this out.
trade.3: Speaking of goods, I've got some weapons here you might like.
trade.4: I'm just organizing new arrivals, want to see if there's anything you need?
trade.5: /player/, you always find the good stuff! How about checking out this new batch of weapons?

leave.1: Alright, /player/, feel free to drop by anytime, you're always welcome here.
leave.2: Take care, /player/! If you run into any trouble, just come find me.
leave.3: Let's catch up another time, I've got some things to take care of.
leave.4: Goodbye, /player/! Hope to hear good news from you next time we meet.
leave.5: Alright, /player/, let's talk again some other time.
